treatment_timeline.doctor: Dr. Jessica Koen or Not specified

actions.recommendation: Your investigations show a high BMI. Increased adipose tissue can cause metabolic disturbances (see blood results), joint strain as well as increased risk for future chronic illness. Working together with support structures (dietician/ exercise) can help reduce your current weight.
Screening of your prostate gland starts over the age of 40 years old. This can be done through a blood test (PSA levels) and clinically examination as you get older.
We can follow-up in the next few months for repeat blood work (Vit D/ ALT/ Fasting glucose/ insulin/ hsCRP/ Cholesterol).
